settings.content: The [Alternating Features](http://cdn.pixelunion.net/startup/alternating-features-screenshot.png) are designed to explain product specifics in a clean and organized format. This section can display up to three features with alternating alignments.

settings.label: Enable cart redirection
settings.info: Automatically sends users to the Cart page after adding a product.

settings.content: [Additional Info Links](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.pixelunion.net/startup/additional-info-screenshot.png) appear wherever a customer can view product information. They’re perfect for linking to size charts, refund policies, or ordering details. Pick from six unique icons.

settings.label: Product
settings.info: Choose the product that will be used for the Product Focus and Product Goal sections

settings.content: Choose your featured product sections and their order.

settings.label: Button text
settings.info: This text will change the button text on the home module, and the add to cart button on the Featured product's page.

settings.label: Estimated delivery text
settings.info: Write a message to let your customers know when they should expect a delivery.

settings.label: Starting quantity
settings.info: To start your goal's progress at 0%, enter a number equal to your Featured product's current inventory.  If you have already made pre-sales, enter a number higher than your Featured product's inventory to account for the progress you've made.

settings.label: Goal quantity
settings.info: This value represents the number of sales/pre-orders you'd like to make before funding is completed.

settings.label: Show product goal as quantity
settings.info: This option will change the product goal to show units sold instead of money raised.

settings.label: End date and time
settings.info: The mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm format is required. For example, June 1st 2016 at 3pm would be 06/01/2016 15:00

settings.content: The product focus feature displays the core highlights of your product on a selected product page

settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
